content: I think I'll do a hybrid approach. I'll ask my followers to submit questions in advance, but also leave some time for real-time questions and comments. That way, I can prepare some thoughtful answers while still allowing for some spontaneity and interaction. By the way, speaking of interaction, I've noticed that my followers are most active during weekdays, specifically between 12 pm and 3 pm EST. Do you think that's a good time to schedule my Q&A session?
